text:
If FM @nsitharaman had
1. Removed LTCG Tax
2. Reducd DDT to 15% (from earlier 20%)
3. Asked SEBI to get rid of ASM,GSM
She would have GOT (not GIVE) stimulus package from investors thru higher STT, higher STCG Tax, Higher valuation on PSU divestment 
#EconomicPackage #Covid19
